Control Statement: The organization: (a) Analyzes communications traffic/event patterns for the information system;(b) Develops profiles representing common traffic patterns and/or events; and(c) Uses the traffic/event profiles in tuning system-monitoring devices to reduce the number of false positives and the number of false negatives.
